parameters.name: Vocal Clarity & Articulation
parameters.description: Speaks clearly with appropriate pace, volume, and pronunciation. Avoids mumbling, speaking too quickly, or using excessive filler words.
guidelines: Maintains clear speech throughout the call
Uses appropriate pace - not too fast or too slow
Maintains consistent volume (not too loud or too quiet)
Minimizes filler words (um, uh, like)
Pronounces financial and technical terms correctly

parameters.name: Active Listening
parameters.description: Demonstrates listening through verbal acknowledgments, appropriate pauses, and relevant follow-up questions that confirm understanding.
guidelines: Uses verbal acknowledgments ("I understand", "I see", etc.)
Doesn't interrupt customer unnecessarily
Asks clarifying questions when needed
Summarizes customer's issue to confirm understanding
Demonstrates understanding by referring back to customer's statements

parameters.name: Tone Management
parameters.description: Uses appropriate voice tone, adapting to customer's emotional state with suitable empathy, while maintaining professionalism.
guidelines: Adjusts tone based on customer's emotional state
Conveys empathy through voice when appropriate
Maintains professional tone even during difficult interactions
Avoids sounding monotone or disinterested
Uses appropriate voice modulation to emphasize key points

parameters.name: Call Flow Management
parameters.description: Manages call pacing, silence, holds, and transitions effectively, guiding the conversation toward resolution.
guidelines: Manages silence appropriately - no awkward long pauses
Explains holds clearly and provides time estimates
Transitions between topics smoothly
Guides conversation toward resolution
Avoids rushing customer or spending too much time on non-essential matters

parameters.name: Clarity & Professionalism
parameters.description: Responses are clear, well-structured, and professional. Avoids unnecessary jargon.
guidelines: Uses appropriate greeting and closing alignment with Pepperstone branding
Explains concepts clearly without excessive jargon
Structures responses logically
Speaks with confidence and authority on Pepperstone services

parameters.name: Tone & Empathy
parameters.description: Maintains a polite, friendly, and appropriate tone. Shows empathy in relevant situations.
guidelines: Shows empathy when customer faces issues or expresses frustration
Adapts tone based on customer's mood and situation
Remains calm and composed even during difficult interactions
Uses appropriate language for showing understanding

parameters.name: Active Listening & Understanding
parameters.description: Acknowledges client concerns and provides relevant, personalized responses instead of generic ones.
guidelines: Demonstrates understanding of customer's specific situation
Doesn't ask the customer to repeat information unnecessarily
Provides personalized responses rather than generic scripts
Addresses all points raised by the customer

parameters.name: Accuracy of Response
parameters.description: Information provided is factually correct and aligns with company policies & trading regulations.
guidelines: Provides accurate information about Pepperstone products and services
Doesn't make claims that contradict company policies
Responds to all customer inquiries correctly
Avoids providing misleading information

parameters.name: Compliance with Internal & Regulatory Policies
parameters.description: Adheres to internal guidelines, AML/KYC requirements, and financial industry regulations.
guidelines: Completes identification verification before sharing account information
Follows proper protocols for high-risk activities
Avoids making investment recommendations
Maintains customer privacy and data security
Follows all relevant financial regulations in verbal communications

parameters.name: Probing & Clarification
parameters.description: Uses effective probing questions to identify the client's issue accurately.
guidelines: Asks relevant questions to understand the issue fully
Uses both open and closed questions appropriately
Clarifies ambiguous information
Adjusts questioning based on customer responses

parameters.name: Troubleshooting
parameters.description: Provides appropriate troubleshooting based on understanding the issue; basic troubleshooting must be completed before escalation.
guidelines: Follows logical troubleshooting steps
Explains troubleshooting process to the customer
Completes basic troubleshooting before escalation
Uses available tools and resources effectively

parameters.name: Escalation Process
parameters.description: Escalates complex cases correctly and follows escalation protocols.
guidelines: Identifies correctly when escalation is needed
Follows proper escalation procedures
Explains escalation process to customer
Provides appropriate handover information when escalating

parameters.name: Call Handling Time
parameters.description: Resolves issues efficiently without unnecessary delays or rushed conclusions.
guidelines: Basic inquiries: Maximum 2 holds (3-5 mins each), total hold time ≤10 mins
Complex inquiries: Maximum 3 holds, total hold time ≤15 mins
Uses time efficiently without rushing customer
Balances thoroughness with appropriate call duration

parameters.name: Call Documentation
parameters.description: Logs key details accurately in internal systems for future reference.
guidelines: Documents key information discussed during call
Records actions taken to resolve issue
Notes any follow-up tasks or commitments
Creates clear, concise, and accurate call summary

parameters.name: Tagging & Categorization
parameters.description: Uses the correct tags or categories for accurate reporting and case tracking.
guidelines: Applies correct call type categorization
Uses appropriate issue tags
Identifies and tags priority level correctly
Links related cases where applicable

quality_levels.name: Fair
quality_levels.description: Adequate service with notable room for improvement

critical_failures.name: Compliance Violation
critical_failures.description: Any violation of compliance requirements, including KYC/AML protocols
critical_failures.impact: Automatic failure regardless of other scores

critical_failures.name: Customer Data Breach
critical_failures.description: Sharing customer information without proper verification
critical_failures.impact: Automatic failure regardless of other scores

critical_failures.name: Misrepresentation
critical_failures.description: Providing false information about company policies or products
critical_failures.impact: Automatic failure regardless of other scores

critical_failures.name: Inappropriate Tone
critical_failures.description: Using rude, dismissive, or unprofessional tone with customer
critical_failures.impact: Automatic failure regardless of other scores

metrics.name: Audio Clarity
metrics.description: The overall clarity of the agent's voice and audio connection

metrics.name: Background Noise
metrics.description: Level of background noise present during the call

metrics.name: Volume Consistency
metrics.description: Consistency of volume levels throughout the call

metrics.name: Call Connection Quality
metrics.description: Quality of the connection without drops or significant static

requirements: Crystal clear agent audio with minimal to no background noise

indicators: Significant static or distortion in agent audio
Loud background noise that interferes with communication
Unprofessional call environment (loud colleagues, music, etc.)
